statements: UPDATE iot_devices SET stock_level = 50, specifications = '{"color": "black", "size": "small"}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE iot_devices SET specifications = '{"color": "white", "size": "medium"}', serial_number = 'SN23567' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE iot_devices SET stock_level = 50, specifications = '{"color": "blue", "size": "M"}' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE iot_devices SET specifications = '{"color": "red", "size": "L"}', stock_level = 30 WHERE serial_number = 'A12345'
UPDATE devices SET stock_level = 20, device_name = 'New Phone' WHERE device_id = 1;
UPDATE devices SET serial_number = 'ABC123', specs = 'High-end features' WHERE device_id = 2;
UPDATE devices SET stock_level = 50, specs = 'Improved specs' WHERE device_id = 1
UPDATE locations SET device_id = 1, location_name = 'Warehouse A' WHERE location_id = 3
UPDATE stock_levels SET current_quantity = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE serial_numbers SET device_id = 100, is_active = FALSE WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE stock_levels SET current_quantity = current_quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE serial_numbers SET is_active = false, serial_number = 'SN-9876' WHERE device_id = 3;
UPDATE stock_levels SET stock_quantity = 50 WHERE device_id = 12345;
UPDATE device_locations SET location_name = 'Warehouse B' WHERE location_id = 100;
UPDATE stock_levels SET stock_quantity = 1000, last_updated = '2022-01-15' WHERE device_id = 101
UPDATE device_specifications SET weight = 1.5, dimensions = '{"length": 10, "width": 5, "height": 3}' WHERE device_id = 202
UPDATE stock_levels SET stock_quantity = 50 WHERE device_id = 12345;
UPDATE device_specifications SET specification_json = '{"color": "red", "weight": "100g"}' WHERE device_id = 54321;
UPDATE stock_levels SET stock_quantity = 100 WHERE device_id = 12345;
UPDATE serial_numbers SET is_available = TRUE, serial_number = 'SN123456' WHERE device_id = 54321;
